EN: The road leads to the left side of the forest.
The road leads to the middle of the forest.
The road leads to the right side of the forest.

CN: 我没看见任何钥匙孔，但是门上倒是有个奇怪的装置。
EN: I don't see any keyhole, but there is a strange mechanism on the door.

CN: 太好了！我可以看见钥匙孔了。是奥尼尔先生做的那个装置吗？
EN: Great! The keyhole appears. Did Mr. O'Neill develop that protection?
